meanings: (손끝에 달려 있는 다섯 개의 가락) finger
to such an extent that it can be counted with fingers

vlive.korean: 새끼손가락의 마디가 좀... The knuckle of my pinky... 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 초코츄러스 만들기🐥🍫
새끼손가락 여기 한 마디 1cm 아니었어요? wasn't one knuckle of your pinky 1cm? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 초코츄러스 만들기🐥🍫
vlive.english: wasn't one knuckle of your pinky 1cm?

vlive.korean: 손가락으로 열심히 누르고 있을 썸니아들에게 메시지를 드릴까요 다 같이? Should we send a message to our InSomnia who are pressing hard with their fingers? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Should we send a message to our InSomnia who are pressing hard with their fingers?

vlive.korean: 안돼 손가락 다치지마! No! Don't break your fingers. 듣기 View video VICTON : 병찬이의 심야라디오📻🌙
안돼~ 손가락 부서지면 안돼! No!! Your fingers can't be broken. 듣기 View video VICTON : 병찬이의 심야라디오📻🌙
vlive.english: No!! Your fingers can't be broken.

examples.korean: She pricked her finger on a needle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 바늘에 손가락을 찔렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She pricked her finger on a needle. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She jabbed her finger in his ribs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 손가락으로 그의 옆구리를 찔렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She jabbed her finger in his ribs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The knife fell from her nerveless fingers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 힘없는 손가락에서 칼이 떨어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The knife fell from her nerveless fingers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He stabbed his finger angrily at my chest. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 손가락으로 내 가슴에다 삿대질을 해 댔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He stabbed his finger angrily at my chest. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He clicked his fingers at the waiter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 웨이터를 보며 손가락을 부딪쳐 딱 소리를 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He clicked his fingers at the waiter. Add to Wordbook
